ifile::IFilePersistence Class Reference
Persistence concept.

Provide loading and saving of objects. More...

#include <IFilePersistence.h>

Detailed Description

Provide loading and saving of objects.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum ifile::IFilePersistence::ErrorType

Possible file I/O errors.

Enumerator:
ET_NO_WRITE_PERMISSIONS 

File could not be written, no write access granted.

ET_NO_READ_PERMISSIONS 

File could not be read, no read access granted.

ET_FILE_NOT_EXIST 

File doesn't exist.

enum ifile::IFilePersistence::OperationState

Result of operation.

Enumerator:
OS_OK 

Operation was successful.

OS_CANCELED 

Operation was aborted by user.

OS_FAILED 

Operation failed.

Definition at line 29 of file IFilePersistence.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool ifile::IFilePersistence::IsOperationSupported ( const istd::IChangeable *  dataObjectPtr,
const QString *  filePathPtr = NULL,
int  flags = -1,
bool  beQuiet = true 
) const [pure virtual]

Returns true if object dataObject can be loaded/saved.

Parameters:
dataObjectPtroptional pointer to data object should be loaded/stored. It can be NULL if any object is meant.
filePathPtroptional pointer to file should be loaded/stored. It can be NULL if any file is meant. If it points at empty string, anonymous loading is mean.
flagscombination of flags defined in QueryFlags and ifile::IFileTypeInfo::QueryFlags.
beQuietif true, no user message output is allowed.

Implemented in ipackage::CRegistryCodeSaverComp, iqtgui::CFileDialogLoaderComp, iimg::CBitmapLoaderComp, iqt::CRenderedObjectFileLoaderComp, ifile::CFileSerializerCompBase, iqt::CSettingsSerializerComp, ilog::CTextFileLogStreamerComp, ifile::CComposedFilePersistenceComp, iqt::CClipboardSerializerComp, and idoc::CTextFileLoaderComp.

const QString &  filePath = QString()
